name: Akirry Roll V1.033
description:
V1.033: Version now displays properly on 16:10 ratios, Q and E buttons can be used to scroll through levels in practice mode, and a diamond-count bug in Hard 11 (Twin Metronomes) has been fixed. Fixed being able to switch levels in practice mode while paused.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

The game contains 210 Levels. 6/10 of the modes are complete, with more being added if interest is great enough.

There is also a practice mode for you to challenge yourself with best times and lowest amounts of jumps.

Download the game, right click the zipped folder and choose 'Extract to Akirry Roller V0.'..., and then you'll find the executable in the new folder.

Controller is recommended. Keyboard also works.
